Package risk

Class AIPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • risk.Player
      • risk.AIPlayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConcreteAIPlayer
    public abstract class AIPlayer
extends Player
    Classe che modella un player virtuale, dotato di intelligenza artificiale.
